pages.title: Life Essence
pages.text: By making sacrifices to the $(item)Old Gods$() we recieve the $(item)Essence of Life$().$(br2)We can use this essence to transform items in the $(item)Blood Altar$() or store it away for later use in $(item)Blood Orbs$() that are bound to us.

The Altar at which you make sacrifices at. The first altar $(item)Tier$() is just one block but later tiers are $(item)Multiblocks$().$(br2)Required knowledge:$(br)$(l:sim_2/knowledge/0_bm)The Sanguinem Faith$()

This dagger allows you to sacrifice some of your $(item)Blood$() to the $(item)Gods$().$(br2)This act will put $(item)Life Essence$() into the altar. Maybe you could make this process less tedious by brewing with $(l:sim_2/5_alchemy#beetroot)Beetroots$()?

pages.title: Materials
pages.text: You will need to create $(item)Slates$() and $(item)Life Essence$() to progress in this $(item)Simulation$(). You can fill buckets with $(item)Life Essence$() by placing them on the$(br)$(item)Blood Altar$().$(br2)You can also use the $(item)Blood Altar$() to create $(l:sim_2/resources/3_magical_crops)Magical Crops$().(Requires a Tier 2 Altar)$(br)(Can be found in $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$())
